questions.question:
A machine learning engineer is working on a binary classification problem for detecting fraudulent transactions.
The model's performance is being evaluated using multiple metrics.
The model has a precision of 90% and a recall of 60%.
The engineer is concerned about missing too many fraudulent transactions.

Which evaluation metric should the engineer focus on to improve the modelâ€™s ability to identify more fraud cases?
